audience: Parents of children 12-17 with anxiety, open to virtual mental health care
screeners: Open to virtual mental health care

questions.text: How satisfied are you with your child's current mental health care?
How concerned are you about your child's mental health?
How comfortable would you be with your child receiving virtual therapy?
How likely are you to try a virtual mental health solution for your child in the next 6 months?
Would you prefer in-person or virtual therapy for your child?
How likely are you to recommend this virtual therapy platform to other parents?
